constructor-arg.value: INSERT into t_pd_bundle_sku (bundle_id, bundle_element_id, item_id, sales_price, sku_id, style) VALUES (:bundleId, :bundleElementId, :itemId, :salesPrice, :skuId, :style)

SELECT DISTINCT b.id bundle_id, b.item_id bundle_item_id, bs.id sku_id, s.list_price, case b.price_type when 1 then s.sale_price when 2 then be.sales_price when 3 then bs.sales_price else s.sale_price end sales_price FROM t_pd_bundle b INNER JOIN t_pd_bundle_element be on be.bundle_id = b.id INNER JOIN t_pd_bundle_sku bs on b.id = bs.bundle_id INNER JOIN t_pd_sku s on bs.sku_id = s.id WHERE b.item_id = :bundleItemId and bs.sku_id in ( #foreach($id in $skuIds) $id, #end -1)

SELECT DISTINCT b.id bundle_id, b.item_id bundle_item_id, bs.id sku_id, s.list_price, case b.price_type when 1 then s.sale_price when 2 then be.sales_price when 3 then bs.sales_price else s.sale_price end sales_price FROM t_pd_bundle b INNER JOIN t_pd_bundle_element be on be.bundle_id = b.id INNER JOIN t_pd_bundle_sku bs on b.id = bs.bundle_id INNER JOIN t_pd_sku s on bs.sku_id = s.id WHERE b.item_id = :bundleItemId AND bs.sku_id = :skuId
